SQL.Statement: select shiphead.INVCTL_DOCUMENT_ID, shiphead.CREATE_DATE, shipline.EXPECTED_COUNT , shipline.POSTED_COUNT FROM INV_INVCTL_DOCUMENT shiphead left join INV_INVCTL_DOCUMENT_LINEITM shipline on shiphead.ORGANIZATION_ID = shipline.ORGANIZATION_ID and shiphead.RTL_LOC_ID=shipline.RTL_LOC_ID and shiphead.INVCTL_DOCUMENT_ID=shipline.INVCTL_DOCUMENT_ID where shiphead.DOCUMENT_TYPCODE ='RECEIVING' and shiphead.STATUS_CODE ='IN_PROCESS'

SELECT employee_id,employee_name,trans_count,round(net_amt,2),round((net_amt/(Select code from COM_CODE_VALUE where category ='EMPLOYEE_COMMISSION_PERCT')),2) as perc_amt FROM (SELECT SUM(tsl.net_amt * tcm.percentage_of_item) AS net_amt, SUM(coalesce( CASE return_flag WHEN 0 THEN tsl.net_amt * tcm.percentage_of_item END, 0)) AS gross_amt, SUM(coalesce( CASE return_flag WHEN 0 THEN tsl.net_amt * tcm.percentage_of_item END, 0)) AS sale_amt, SUM(coalesce( CASE return_flag WHEN 1 THEN tsl.net_amt * tcm.percentage_of_item END, 0)) AS return_amt, hre.employee_id, CASE WHEN coalesce(upper(hre.first_name), ' ') <> ' ' OR coalesce(upper(hre.last_name), ' ') <> ' ' THEN concat(hre.first_name, concat('::', hre.last_name)) END AS employee_name, SUM(tsl.quantity) AS item_quantity, COUNT(DISTINCT(concat(CAST(tcm.business_date AS CHAR(50)),concat(CAST(tcm.wkstn_id AS CHAR(50)),CAST(tcm.trans_seq AS CHAR(50)))))) AS trans_count FROM rpt_sale_line tsl INNER JOIN trl_commission_mod tcm ON tcm.organization_id = tsl.organization_id AND tcm.rtl_loc_id = tsl.rtl_loc_id AND tcm.business_date = tsl.business_date AND tcm.wkstn_id = tsl.wkstn_id AND tcm.trans_seq = tsl.trans_seq AND tcm.rtrans_lineitm_seq = tsl.rtrans_lineitm_seq INNER JOIN crm_party hre ON tsl.organization_id = hre.organization_id AND tcm.employee_party_id = hre.party_id WHERE tsl.organization_id = ? AND tsl.rtl_loc_id = ? AND tsl.trans_date = ? AND upper(tsl.trans_statcode) = 'COMPLETE' AND ( tsl.exclude_from_net_sales_flag IS NULL OR tsl.exclude_from_net_sales_flag <> '1' ) AND (upper(hre.employee_id) LIKE '%' ) GROUP BY hre.employee_id,hre.last_name,hre.first_name) dt ORDER BY employee_id
